attributes.action: Cut the red tape and cost re foreign registered nurses  adaptation programme inorder to enter British workforce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was born in UK and I am a  Registered Nurse in Jamaica since 1986.I have been desperately trying  to get my Pin # for 8 years . 
Due to serious documentation  errors  by UKCC  and NMC, constant change in the law I am still without my Pin # .
 I  registered with UKCC in 2000 .April 2002 UKCC  became NMC. . UKCC made a serious error on my registration  re D.O.B.I pointed out error to UKCC and NMC.Yet NMC  still had  error re D.O.B up to end of 2003.

 NMC frequently  changed law.
2003 Duration and fee increased , 2005 ELTS exam (compulsory),2007 Jan upgrade in ELTS  pass mark ,2007 Oct-no more extension. If nurse cannot find placement in period given file is closed and she has to pay (£118).to re-open file again.
 Financial Crisis in NHS.has led to no placements available.
 RN’s  pay £1000's to do Adaptation through a University.Too much cost to meet reqirements.

Official complaint  was  made to  NMC only offered me a fee waiver for 2006 but gave me no financial compensation for all years I lost income due to their negligence

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
